Reminders.EmailReminderIntro: You are receiving the email since you have subscribed for Huld Shopping Bag list notifications. At least one of your subscribed shopping list has due or expected delivery date close.
Reminders.EmailReminderTurnOffEmails: If you don't wish to get these emails, you can turn off all notifications or change the subscriptions for new lists in Account Settings page. List specific notifications can be controlled by clicking the notification bell icon.
